function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"WBE not used to monitor for viable, infectious virions","Impact":"Missing active infection indicators, public health risk","Mitigation":"Incorporate WBE for active infection monitoring","Technologies":"WBE monitoring, sewage testing technology","People":"Public, community, public health officials","Owner":"Public health officials, researchers, policymakers"},{"Description":"Erroneous belief in the presence of \"live\" virus in sewage","Impact":"Public panic, anxiety, misinformation","Mitigation":"Proper communication of WBE data, education on sewage virus distinction","Technologies":"Science communication, public health education","People":"Public, community","Owner":"Science writers, public health officials, experts"},{"Description":"Intense interest in the potential release of virus into surface waters","Impact":"Environmental contamination, public health risk","Mitigation":"Proper monitoring and management of sewage, public education on risks","Technologies":"Environmental monitoring technology, public health education","People":"Public, environmental organizations","Owner":"Environmental agencies, public health officials"}]}
